English:
[c][ffae00][b]Robinson Protocol deactivated.[/b][-][/c]
[c][ffae00][b][/b][-][/c]You can reactivate the Tutorial via PDA ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 'Tutorial' tab > Robinson Protocol

Check the [u]Empyriopedia[/u] ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) for more game information!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffae00][b]罗宾逊协议已停用。[/b][-][/c]\n[c][ffae00][b][/b][-][/c]您可以通过掌上电脑（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）>'教程 '选项卡>罗宾逊协议重新激活教程[u]帝国百科[/u]（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）查看更多游戏信息！
游戏开始 - 角色扮演激活

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Stationary Constructors Management[-][/c][/u]

Use the [c][44ff00]( i )[-][/c] button on the TOP CENTER area above the CONSTRUCTION QUEUE headline to display all operating and usage instructions for constructors!

[c][ffffff]Assign Container for Production[-][/c]
For a constructor to function on a base or in a vessel, at least one container must always be assigned to it. This container can be used for INPUT/OUTPUT at the same time. It is also possible to assign different containers for INPUT and OUTPUT! These containers can be already in use with other constructors! (Production Link). [c][fbff00]Assign containers by using the dropdown in the INPUT / OUPUT headline![-][/c]

[c][ffffff]Item Management[-][/c]
Resources or products can be added or removed via the button NEXT to the container-assign dropdown. Directly adding or removing items is not possible.

[c][ffffff]Button Shortcuts[-][/c]
Left mouse click on a template of the right overview = add 1 to the production queue

SHIFT + Left mouse click = add 10
CTRL + Left mouse click = add 100
SHIFT+CTRL + Left mouse click = add 1000

If you do the same with a RIGHT mouse click on an item in the production queue, the production count will be reduced accordingly.

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > TUTORIALS tab > Video Manuals[/i]
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics & Starter Info[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]固定建造机管理[-][/c][/u]

使用[c][44ff00]( i )[-][/c]按钮在建造队列标题上方的中心区域来显示所有建造机的操作和使用说明！

[c][ffffff]分配容器进行生产[-][/c]
为了让建造机在基地或飞船上运作，至少必须给它分配一个容器。这个容器可以同时用于输入/输出。也可以为输入和输出分配不同的容器！这些容器可能已经被其他建造机使用！（生产链接）。[c][fbff00]通过在输入/输出标题下拉菜单中分配容器！[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]物品管理[-][/c]
资源或产品可以通过容器分配下拉菜单旁边的按钮添加或移除。不能直接添加或移除物品。

[c][ffffff]按钮快捷方式[-][/c]
左键单击右侧概览中的模板 = 在生产队列中添加1个

SHIFT + 左键单击 = 添加10个
CTRL + 左键单击 = 添加100个
SHIFT+CTRL + 左键单击 = 添加1000个

如果你在生产队列中的物品上使用右键单击，生产数量将相应减少。
[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 教程标签 > 视频手册[/i]
[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制 & 入门信息[/i]

English:
[u][c][fbff00]YOU ARE GETTING HUNGRY![-][/c][/u]
[u][/u][i][/i]Check your inventory if you have something to eat or craft some food with your Survival Constructor, Portable Constructor or Food Processor. [c][00ff11]SHIFT + RMB[-][/c] click on the item to eat or use [c][00ff11]LMB[-][/c] (when placed in toolbar).

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u][c][fbff00]你越来越饿了！[-][/c][/u]
检查你的库存是否有食物，或者使用你的生存建造机、便携式建造机或食品加工机制作食物。[c][00ff11]SHIFT + RMB[-][/c]点击物品以食用或使用[c][00ff11]LMB[-][/c]（当放置在工具栏中时）。

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[u][c][fbff00]INJURY DETECTED![-][/c][/u]
Injuries and afflictions can worsen if they are not treated. However, some diseases can be temporarily halted in their course with the right medication! [c][ffffff]Press [-][/c][c][44ff00]ESC[-][/c][c][ffffff] and hover over the status icon to see which medication will help![-][/c]
[i][/i]
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia >  Afflictions & Medical Items[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff]伤口已治愈！[-][/c]
如果未经治疗，伤口会恶化，尽管有些疾病可以通过[c][ffffff]缓解[-][/c]正确的药物。

[u]注意[/u]：只要疾病处于活跃状态，你可以将鼠标悬停在库存中的图标上（[c][44ff00]Tab[-][/c]）以获取更多信息。

English:
[u][c][fbff00]BODY TEMPERATURE RISING! [-][/c][/u]
To reduce body temperature, consume water or juices, get inside an activated base or vessel, or build the [c][ffffff]Portable Heater/Cooler[-][/c] (Survival Constructor > [c][44ff00]TAB[-][/c]) and stand close to it! Taking a shower will help as well! 

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u][c][fbff00]体温上升！[-][/c][/u]
为了降低体温，可以喝水或果汁、进入激活的基地或飞船内，或建造[c][ffffff]便携式加热器/冷却器[-][/c]（生存建造机 > [c][44ff00]TAB[-][/c]）并站在它旁边！洗个澡也会有帮助！

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[u][c][fbff00]RADIATION CONTAMINATION DETECTED! [-][/c][/u]
Taking a shower can help lower your radiation level! Use an anti-radiation medication or other medical items to heal more serious radiation sicknesses.

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Afflictions & Medical Items[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u][c][fbff00]检测到辐射污染！[-][/c][/u]
洗个澡可以帮助降低你的辐射水平！使用抗辐射药物或其他医疗物品治疗更严重的辐射病。

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 疾病与医疗物品[/i]

English:
[u][c][fbff00]BODY TEMPERATURE DROPPING![-][/c][/u]
To increase the body temperature, consume hot beverages, eat cooked food, get inside an activated base or vessel, or use the [c][ffffff]Portable Heater/Cooler [-][/c] (Survival Constructor > [c][44ff00]TAB[-][/c]) and stand close to it! Taking a shower will help as well!  
[i][/i]
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u][c][fbff00]体温下降！[-][/c][/u]
为了提高体温，可以喝热饮、吃煮熟的食物、进入激活的基地或飞船内，或使用[c][ffffff]便携式加热器/冷却器[-][/c]（生存建造机 > [c][44ff00]TAB[-][/c]）并站在它旁边！洗个澡也会有帮助！

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[u][c][fbff00]NIGHTFALL IMMINENT![-][/c][/u]
Craft a Survival Tent in your survival constructor or find a bed to sleep 8 hours, through the night or while waiting for a product to finish crafting. You cannot sleep when enemies are nearby!
[i][/i]
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u][c][fbff00]夜幕即将降临！[-][/c][/u]
在你的生存建造机中制作[c][ffffff]生存帐篷[-][/c]或找张床睡8小时，度过夜晚或等待产品完成制作。当敌人靠近时你不能睡觉！

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[u][c][fbff00]SUIT OXYGEN LOW - REFILL![-][/c][/u]
Use a [c][ffffff]Water/O2 Condenser[-][/c] or a constructor to make [c][ffffff]small or emergency O2 bottles[-][/c] to refill your suit gradually. Use an O2 station to refill your suit in one go.

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u][c][fbff00]氧气不足 - 需要补充！[-][/c][/u]
使用[c][ffffff]水/氧气冷凝器[-][/c]或建造机制作[c][ffffff]小型或紧急氧气瓶[-][/c]逐步补充你的氧气。使用氧气站一次性补充你的氧气。

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Handheld Mining[-][/c][/u]
Switch the Survival Tool to [c][ffffff]Resource Mode[-][/c], point to the ground and press [c][44ff00]LMB[-][/c] to drill down to the deposit towards the deposit HUD marker. Use your Personal Drone ([c][44ff00]F5[-][/c]) to avoid getting trapped in the mining pit.
 
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]手持采矿[-][/c][/u]
将生存工具切换到[c][ffffff]资源模式[-][/c]，指向地面并按下[c][44ff00]LMB[-][/c]向下钻探至矿床HUD标记。使用你的个人无人机（[c][44ff00]F5[-][/c]）以避免被困在采矿坑中。

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Constructors[-][/c][/u]
Constructors generate all the materials and equipment needed for survival, combat, and building. Your suit constructor and a portable constructor can only provide you with the bare necessities. Level up to unlock better production devices in the techtree ([c][44ff00]F3[-][/c]).

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics & Starter Info[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]建造机[-][/c][/u]
[c][00ffff][-][/c]建造机生成所有生存、战斗和建造所需的材料和设备。

你的衣服内置的生存建造机和便携式建造机只能为你提供最基本的必需品。

升级以在科技树（[c][44ff00]F3[-][/c]）中解锁更好的生产设备。

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00e1ff]Wood[-][/c][/u]
Wood is a basic resource and the simplest material from which you can build your first [c][ffffff]shelter - [-][/c]but at first, you need a [c][ffffff]Portable Constructor[-][/c]! [c][fbff00][-][/c]Unlock it in the Techtree ([c][44ff00]F3[-][/c]) and craft one in the Survival Constructor ([c][44ff00]TAB[-][/c])

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics & Starter Info[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00e1ff]木材[-][/c][/u]
木材是一种基本资源，也是你可以建造第一个[c][ffffff]庇护所[-][/c]的最简单材料——但首先，你需要一个[c][ffffff]便携式建造机[-][/c]！[c][fbff00][-][/c]在科技树（[c][44ff00]F3[-][/c]）中解锁它，并在生存建造机（[c][44ff00]TAB[-][/c]）中制作一个

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制 & 入门信息[/i]

English:
[c][00ffff]Craftable now: SHELTER Type C[-][/c]
Carbon is a very easy material to obtain and you can very easily build a first shelter with it! Use a [c][ffffff]Portable Constructor[-][/c][c][fbff00]*[-][/c] to create [c][ffffff]Carbon Substrate[-][/c] from the collected [c][ffffff]Carbon Ore[-][/c]!

[c][fbff00]*[-][/c][i]Unlock in Techtree ([c][44ff00]F3[-][/c]) and craft in the Survival Constructor ([c][44ff00]TAB[-][/c])[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff]现在可以制作：C型避难所[-][/c]
碳是一种非常容易获得的材料，你可以非常容易地用它建造第一个避难所！使用[c][ffffff]便携式建造机[-][/c][c][fbff00]*[-][/c]从收集到的[c][ffffff]碳矿石[-][/c]中创建[c][ffffff]碳基质[-][/c]！

[c][fbff00]*[-][/c][i]在科技树([c][44ff00]F3[-][/c])中解锁，并在生存建造器([c][44ff00]TAB[-][/c])中制作[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00e1ff]Volume Limitation[-][/c][/u]
Your inventory can only hold a certain volume! Armor Suits and boosters will help you increase the capacity. For even more storage space, build vehicles such as a hoverbike from the Blueprint Libary ([c][44ff00]F2[-][/c]).
[i][/i]
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia >  Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00e1ff]体积限制[-][/c][/u]
你的背包只能容纳一定的体积！装甲服和助推器将帮助你增加容量。为了获得更多的存储空间，从蓝图库（[c][44ff00]F2[-][/c]）中建造交通工具，如悬浮摩托车。

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00e1ff]Detector (Vessel)[-][/c][/u]
Vessel based detectors have a much higher range than handheld versions. Captial vessels have the highest range detectors.

[i]More info ([/i][i][c][00ff11]F1[-][/c]) [/i][i]: [u]Help Section[/u] > Video Manuals[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00e1ff]探测器（飞船）[-][/c][/u]
基于飞船的探测器比手持版本的探测范围要大得多。主力舰拥有探测范围最远的探测器。

[i]更多信息 ([/i][i][c][00ff11]F1[-][/c])[/i][i]：[u]帮助部分[/u] > 视频手册[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Furnace[-][/c][/u]
[c][00ffff][u][/u][-][/c]
A Furnace is a specialized constructor that can automatically produce its products in very rapid succession.
This device is not available as a terrain placeable.

Use the [c][44ff00]( i )[-][/c] button on the LOWER RIGHT below the 'Templates' list field to display all operating and usage instructions for constructors!
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]熔炉[-][/c][/u]
[c][00ffff][-][/c]
熔炉是一种专门的建造机，能够以非常快的速度自动精炼矿石。
这个设备不能作为地形放置物。

使用'模板'列表字段下方右下角的[c][44ff00]( i )[-][/c]按钮来显示所有建造机的操作和使用说明！

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Deconstructor[-][/c][/u]
[c][00ffff][u][/u][-][/c]End products of constructors can be broken down into their components again. A deconstructor is required for this purpose. This device is not available as a terrain placeable.

Use the [c][44ff00]( i )[-][/c] button on the LOWER RIGHT below the 'Templates' list field to display all operating and usage instructions for constructors!
Chinese (simplified): \n[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]解构器[-][/c][/u]\n[c][00ffff][-][/c]构造器制造的最终产品（设备和模块）可以再次分解成它们的组件。为此，需要一个被归类为构造器类型的解构器。使用 '模板 '列表字段下方右下方的[c][44ff00]( i )[-][/c] 按钮，可以显示构造器的所有操作和使用说明！

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Crouch[-][/c][/u]
Crouching allows you to pass low corridors and some narrow places. Press and hold [c][44ff00]C[-][/c] to crouch (or double-tap to stay crouched). Use W,S,A,D to move.

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]蹲伏[-][/c][/u]
蹲伏可以让你通过低矮的走廊和一些狭窄的地方。按下并按住[c][44ff00]C[-][/c]以蹲伏（或双击以保持蹲伏）。使用W,S,A,D移动。

[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]This seems to be an old scientist camp! \n\nWe should [c][fbff00]search the containers[-][/c] and see if the [c][fbff00]console[-][/c] contains valuable information!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]这似乎是一个古老的科学家营地！\n\n我们应该[c][fbff00]搜索容器[-][/c]，看看[c][fbff00]控制台[-][/c]是否包含有价值的信息！

English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]The facility looks as if the ravages of time have gnawed away at it, but we will find some useful equipment or supplies. \n\nSearch for the [c][fbff00]core [-][/c]in the [c][fbff00]lower levels of the base[-][/c] and I can show you a way to [c][fbff00]loot a structure with less effort[-][/c]!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]这个设施看起来好像时间的侵蚀已经侵蚀了它，但我们可能会找到一些有用的设备或供应品。\n\n在[c][fbff00]基地的下层[-][/c]寻找[c][fbff00]核心[-][/c]，我可以向你展示一种[c][fbff00]以较少努力掠夺结构[-][/c]的方法！

English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]An excavation site with an ... interesting energy signature.  The site appears to be deactivated.  Maybe [c][fbff00]turning it on[-][/c] will help us or at least provide some interesting insights.\n\nSearch all containers and look for more logs and consoles!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]一个挖掘现场，拥有...有趣的能量特征。现场似乎已经停用。也许[c][fbff00]启动它[-][/c]会帮助我们，或者至少提供一些有趣的见解。\n\n搜索所有容器，寻找更多的日志和控制台！

English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]This looks like another camp of scientists. Perhaps they were investigating the unusual [c][fbff00]structure nearby[-][/c]?  \n\nExamine the containers and consoles for information!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]这看起来是另一个科学家的营地。也许他们正在调查附近[c][fbff00]不寻常的结构[-][/c]？\n\n检查容器和控制台以获取信息！

English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]This appears to be a farm. However, very ... backward. No visible technology. Be careful if you [c][fbff00]talk[-][/c] to anyone there. We don't know if they have seen us falling from the sky. \n\nTry to find out if they know anything...
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]这似乎是一个农场。不过，非常......落后。看不到技术 \n注意，你也许可以[c][fbff00]和那里的任何人交谈[-][/c]，以获取信息。

English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  Interesting. A technical structure on a rather rural world.  Be careful when approaching or looting it - the facility [c][fbff00]may still be guarded[-][/c]!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c] 有趣。在一个相当乡村的世界上有一个技术结构。接近或掠夺它时要小心 - 设施[c][fbff00]可能仍有守卫[-][/c]！

English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]The wrecks in the vicinity seem very old.  Go closer, but pay attention to the surroundings! Maybe we can find out what happened here.  \n\nUse the [c][fbff00]survival tool[-][/c] in [c][fbff00]salvage mode[-][/c] and gather some components!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]附近的残骸看起来非常古老。靠近一点，但要注意周围的环境！也许我们能知道这里发生了什么 \n在[c][fbff00]打捞模式[-][/c]下使用[c][fbff00]生存工具[-][/c]，尽可能收集材料和部件！

English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  This tower, surrounded by a field of ruins is possibly the remnant of an earlier settlement of this planet.  Look around carefully. Maybe you will find something interesting. But keep an eye on the surroundings! There could be [c][fbff00]dangerous animals[-][/c] here!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] 这座被一片废墟包围的高塔可能是这个星球早期定居点的遗迹。仔细看看周围。也许你会发现一些有趣的东西。但要注意周围的环境！这里可能有[c][fbff00]危险的动物[-][/c]！
耳语：启动器（任意）--一次性
耳语：知识之泉（任意）--一次性

[i][Strong Whispering Coming From The Obelisk][/i]

Pro enh Gyn Tihor[c][00ffff][-][/c]
Pro enh Gyn Tihor
Pro enh Gyn Tihor

Pro enh Gyn Tihor[c][00ffff][-][/c]

English:
[i][Faint Whispering Coming From The Structure][/i]

Pro enh Gyn Tihor[c][00ffff][-][/c]
Pro enh Gyn Tihor
Pro enh Gyn Tihor

English: [c][44ff00][b]Robinson Protocol activated![/b][-][/c]\n\nImportant: If you ever miss, over-read or forget an info about a game mechanic, you can always look it up in the Empyriopedia ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) or in the Video Manuals ([c][44ff00]F1 > Tutorial Tab[-][/c])!
Chinese (simplified): [c][44ff00][b]罗宾逊协议激活！[/b][-][/c]\n\n重要：如果你错过、过度阅读或忘记了关于游戏机制的任何信息，你可以随时在帝国百科（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）或视频手册（[c][44ff00]F1 > 教程标签[-][/c]）中查找！

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00e1ff]PERSONAL DATA ASSISTANT (PDA)[-][/c][/u]
You can use the PDA to read mission histories or logs or to start special missions manually. In all cases you proceed as follows: 

1. Click on a [c][ffffff]topic [-][/c]tab in the menu bar, e.g. TUTORIAL. 
2. Click on the arrow behind a [c][ffffff]group [-][/c]to expand its topics, e.g. VIDEO MANUALS.
3. Click on a [c][ffffff]mission[-][/c], e.g. GAME START TIPS.
4. Click on the '[c][ffffff]ACTIVATE[-][/c]' button, then follow the instructions.

[c][ffffff]If you get stuck on a mission or it doesn't start, check the mission description to see if you missed something![-][/c] Also pay attention to information that is given to you, e.g. that a new entry has been saved or has become available. 

[c][ffffff]Topics[-][/c]:
Tutorial - Help topics for beginners & video manuals.
Solo Missions - Story missions & descriptions 
Empyriopedia - Knowledge database! 
Journey Book - Global story progress tracker 

[c][ffffff]PDA INFO : [-][/c]displays mission descriptions/chapter entries.

[c][ffffff]PDA LOG[-][/c] : Click on the heading of a mission and the dialogs and messages sent during the active mission are displayed in chronological order.

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > TUTORIALS tab > Video Manuals[/i]
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00e1ff]个人数据助理（PDA）[-][/c][/u]
您可以使用PDA阅读任务历史或日志，或手动启动特殊任务。在所有情况下，您的操作如下：

1. 点击菜单栏中的[c][ffffff]主题[-][/c]标签，例如教程。
2. 点击[c][ffffff]组[-][/c]后面的箭头以展开其主题，例如视频手册。
3. 点击[c][ffffff]任务[-][/c]，例如游戏开始提示。
4. 点击[c][ffffff]激活[-][/c]按钮，然后按照说明操作。

[c][ffffff]如果您在任务中遇到困难或任务无法开始，请检查任务描述，看看是否遗漏了什么！[-][/c]此外，请注意提供给您的信息，例如新的条目已被保存或已可用。

[c][ffffff]主题[-][/c]：
教程 - 初学者的帮助主题和视频手册。
单人任务 - 故事任务和描述
帝国百科 - 知识数据库！
旅行手册 - 全球故事进度追踪器

[c][ffffff]PDA信息：[-][/c]显示任务描述/章节条目。

[c][ffffff]PDA日志[-][/c]：点击任务的标题，任务活跃期间发送的对话和消息将按时间顺序显示。

[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 教程标签 > 视频手册[/i]
[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]
准备制作： 抗生素软膏

English:
[c][00ffff]Craftable now: ANTIBIOTIC OINTMENT[-][/c][c][00ffff] (TAB > Survival Constructor)[-][/c]
Antibiotic ointment helps against [c][ffffff]dermal burn[-][/c], [c][ffffff]frostbite [-][/c]and [c][ffffff]necrosis[-][/c]. All things that should definitely not get worse. Always have a few of these ointments with you for first aid!

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Afflictions & Medical items section![/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]现在可以制作：抗生素药膏[-][/c]\n抗生素药膏有助于对抗 [c][ffffff]皮肤烧伤[-][/c]、[c][ffffff]冻伤[-][/c] 和 [c][ffffff]坏死[-][/c]。所有这些情况都绝对不应该恶化。总是随身携带一些这种药膏以备急救！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 疾病与医疗物品部分！[/i]
准备制作 解毒药膏

English: [c][00ffff]Craftable now: ANTI-TOXIC OINTMENT[-][/c][c][00ffff] ([-][/c][c][00ffff]TAB >[-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff]Survival Constructor)[-][/c]\nAntitoxic Ointment is something you should always have in your stash when messing with biting, poisonous creatures. The ointment cures [c][ffffff]poisonous bite (Stage 1+2)[-][/c] and [c][ffffff]dermal parasites[-][/c] before their condition worsens!\n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Afflictions & Medical items section![/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]现在可以制作：抗毒药膏[-][/c]\n当你与咬人、有毒的生物打交道时，你应该总是在你的储备中有一些抗毒药膏。这种药膏可以治愈 [c][ffffff]有毒咬伤（第一阶段+第二阶段）[-][/c] 和 [c][ffffff]皮肤寄生虫[-][/c]，防止它们的状况恶化！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 疾病与医疗物品部分！[/i]

English: [c][00ffff]Craftable now: BANDAGES[-][/c][c][00ffff] ([-][/c][c][00ffff]TAB >[-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff]Survival Constructor)[-][/c]\nMake bandages as soon as you can! These not only give you back [c][ffffff]health[-][/c], but also heal [c][ffffff]open wounds[-][/c] and [c][ffffff]dermal burns[-][/c]. They also alleviate the course of [c][ffffff]open and closed fractures[-][/c]! One of the most important items in your first aid box!\n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Afflictions & Medical items section![/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]现在可以制作：绷带[-][/c]\n尽快制作绷带！这些不仅可以让你恢复 [c][ffffff]健康[-][/c]，还可以治疗 [c][ffffff]开放性伤口[-][/c] 和 [c][ffffff]皮肤烧伤[-][/c]。它们还可以缓解 [c][ffffff]开放性和闭合性骨折[-][/c] 的过程！你急救箱中最重要的物品之一！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 疾病与医疗物品部分！[/i]

English:
[c][00ffff]Craftable now: HOT BEVERAGE [-][/c][c][00ffff]([-][/c][c][00ffff]TAB >[-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff]Survival Constructor)[-][/c]
Make a hot drink directly from the collected buds on stock! This not only [c][ffffff]warms[-][/c] you up, but also helps against [c][ffffff]hangover[-][/c], [c][ffffff]bad trip[-][/c] and [c][ffffff]indigestion[-][/c].

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Afflictions & Medical items section![/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff]现在可以制作：热饮[-][/c]
直接用收集到的芽孢制作热饮！不仅可以 [c][ffffff]温暖[-][/c] 你，还可以对抗 [c][ffffff]宿醉[-][/c]、[c][ffffff]糟糕的旅行[-][/c] 和 [c][ffffff]消化不良[-][/c]。

[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 疾病与医疗物品部分！[/i]
准备制作：热饮 能量饮料

English: [c][00ffff]Craftable now: ENERGY DRINK[-][/c][c][00ffff]  ([-][/c][c][00ffff]TAB >[-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff]Survival Constructor)[-][/c]\nNatural Stimulant has some nasty side effects when eaten directly. Better make an energy drink out of it! Gives you back a lot of [c][ffffff]stamina [-][/c]immediately and helps when an opponent has [c][ffffff]stunned [-][/c]you! Don't drink too many at once!\n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Afflictions & Medical items section![/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]现在可以制作：能量饮料[-][/c]\n天然兴奋剂直接食用会有一些不良副作用。最好用它制作能量饮料！可以立即恢复大量 [c][ffffff]耐力[-][/c] 并在对手使你 [c][ffffff]昏迷[-][/c] 时有所帮助！不要一次喝太多！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 疾病与医疗物品部分！[/i]

English: [c][00ffff]Craftable now: VEGETABLE JUICE[-][/c][c][00ffff]  ([-][/c][c][00ffff]TAB >[-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff]Survival Constructor)[-][/c]\nInstead of eating the vegetables directly, you can make a vegetable juice! This not only gives you back some [c][ffffff]health [-][/c]and [c][ffffff]stamina [-][/c]and [c][ffffff]cools [-][/c]you down slightly, but also works against [c][ffffff]hangover [-][/c]and [c][ffffff]indigestion[-][/c]!\n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Afflictions & Medical items section![/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]现在可以制作：蔬菜汁[-][/c]\n你可以直接吃蔬菜，也可以制作蔬菜汁！这不仅可以让你恢复一些 [c][ffffff]健康[-][/c] 和 [c][ffffff]耐力[-][/c] 并 [c][ffffff]轻微降温[-][/c]，还可以对抗 [c][ffffff]宿醉[-][/c] 和 [c][ffffff]消化不良[-][/c]！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 疾病与医疗物品部分！[/i]
准备就绪 紧急氧气

English: [c][00ffff]Craftable now: EMERGENCY O2  ([-][/c][c][00ffff]TAB >[-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff]Survival Constructor)[-][/c]\nYou can either drink the purified water to [c][ffffff]cool yourself down[-][/c], or, in case you go into space or to a planet with a non-breathable atmosphere, make some Emergency O2 bottles from it to [c][ffffff]refill your suit O2[-][/c]!\n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Afflictions & Medical items section![/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]现在可以制作：紧急氧气[-][/c]\n你可以直接饮用净化水来 [c][ffffff]降温[-][/c]，或者，如果你进入太空或一个无法呼吸的大气行星，可以用它制作一些紧急氧气瓶来 [c][ffffff]补充你的宇航服氧气[-][/c]！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 疾病与医疗物品部分！[/i]

English: Ready To Craft: Constructor - Motorbike & Shelter
Chinese (simplified): 准备制作：建造机 - 摩托车与避难所

English: Ready To Craft: Constructor - Place on Terrain
Chinese (simplified): 准备制作：建造机 - 放置在地形上

English: [u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Terrain Placeables[-][/c][/u]\nSelect the Portable Constructor in your toolbar. You will see a [c][00ffff]blue holo preview[-][/c] image.  Move it to a good position and press the [c][44ff00]left mouse button[-][/c] to place it!  This applies to all TERRAIN PLACEABLES!\n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics & Starter Info[/i]
Chinese (simplified): [u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]地形放置物[-][/c][/u]\n选择工具栏中的便携建造机。你会看到一个 [c][00ffff]蓝色全息预览[-][/c] 图像。将其移动到一个好的位置，然后按 [c][44ff00]鼠标左键[-][/c] 放置它！这适用于所有地形放置物！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制 & 初学者信息[/i]

English:
[u][c][00ffff]NEXT STEPS[-][/c][/u]
Use the Portable Constructor and build e.g. a [c][ffffff]Motorbike[-][/c] from its DEVICES tab for improved mobility AND collect [c][ffffff]wood and carbon[-][/c] for starting your first [c][ffffff]shelter[-][/c] soon! 

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics & Starter Info[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u][c][00ffff]下一步[-][/c][/u]
使用便携式建造机，例如从其设备标签中建造一辆[c][ffffff]摩托车[-][/c]以提高机动性，并收集[c][ffffff]木材和碳[-][/c]以尽快开始建造你的第一座[c][ffffff]避难所[-][/c]！

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制与新手信息[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00e1ff]TECHTREE[-][/c][/u] ( {keybind(TechTree)} )

[c][ffffff]Step 1[-][/c]
Collect XP points, for example by killing enemies, mining or harvesting plants, to increase your player level.

[c][ffffff]Step 2[-][/c]
Earn UNLOCK points for each new level you reach.

[c][ffffff]Step 3[-][/c]
Spend UNLOCK points to unlock various tools, gadgets and blocks in the techtree.

[c][ffffff]Consider unlocking the [u]PORTABLE CONSTRUCTOR[/u] from the [u]MISC[/u] tab at first![-][/c]

Note on weapons: When you unlock a weapon, its ammunition automatically becomes available.

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > TUTORIALS tab > Video Manuals[/i]
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00e1ff]科技树[-][/c][/u] ( {keybind(TechTree)} )

[c][ffffff]步骤 1[-][/c]
通过击杀敌人、采矿或收获植物来收集经验值，以提高你的玩家等级。

[c][ffffff]步骤 2[-][/c]
每达到一个新的等级，你将获得解锁点。

[c][ffffff]步骤 3[-][/c]
使用解锁点在科技树中解锁各种工具、小玩意和方块。

[c][ffffff]首先考虑解锁[u]便携式建造机[/u]在[u]杂项[/u]标签下！[-][/c]

关于武器的说明：当你解锁一个武器时，它的弹药会自动可用。

[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 教程标签 > 视频手册[/i]
[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Beneficial Buffs![-][/c][/u]
When you're 'Well Fed' you're slowly [c][ffffff]getting back health[-][/c] gradually! This and other 'beneficial buffs' have advantages and disadvantages, but you can use them to your advantage in certain situations!

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia >  Afflictions & Benefits[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]有益的增益效果！[-][/c][/u]
当你'吃得好'时，你会慢慢[c][ffffff]恢复健康[-][/c]！这和其他'有益的增益效果'有优点和缺点，但你可以在某些情况下利用它们！

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 疾病与益处[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Handheld WEAPONS[-][/c][/u]
Remember to reload the weapon before the fight ([c][44ff00]R[-][/c]).  Some weapons also have zoom ([c][44ff00]right mouse button[-][/c]). 
IMPORTANT: If the crosshair of your weapon is [c][ffae00]NOT red,[-][/c] your target is [c][ffae00]out of range[-][/c] (general range information > bottom right!).
[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics [/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]手持武器[-][/c][/u]
记住在战斗前重新装填武器（[c][44ff00]R[-][/c]）。一些武器也有缩放功能（[c][44ff00]右键单击[-][/c]）。
重要提示：如果你的武器准星[c][ffae00]不是红色[-][/c]，你的目标[c][ffae00]超出了射程[-][/c]（一般射程信息 > 右下角！）。
[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]This appears to have been a vehicle factory. Possibly with underground manufacturing facilities! This could be worthwhile..\n\nSearch for the [c][fbff00]core [-][/c]in the [c][fbff00]lower levels of the base[-][/c] and I can show you a way to [c][fbff00]loot a structure with less effort[-][/c]!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]这似乎是一个车辆工厂。可能有地下制造设施！这可能是值得的。\n\n在基地的[c][fbff00]下层[-][/c]寻找[c][fbff00]核心[-][/c]，我可以向你展示一种[c][fbff00]更省力地掠夺结构[-][/c]的方法！
[c][ff0000]首先阅读：[-][/c] 消息存档 - 教程（组）

English:
In this archive you will find the messages that appear on the screen when you pick up a certain item for the first time or open a game window for the first time while having the Robinson Protocol ([c][ffffff]Tutorial[-][/c]) help activated!

The messages will become visible bit by bit.

To re-read any message or dialogue text (does not include videos or pictures) that has popped up on your screen, do the following:

1. Click on the dropdown arrow behind the '[c][fbff00]Message Archive - Tutorial[-][/c]' group headline.   A list will appear.
2. In the list, click on the [c][ffffff]headline[-][/c] of the topic or message that you want to read again.
3. On the top right screen click on [c][44ff00]PDA LOG[-][/c] 

{ReadFirst-MessageArchives.jpg} 

The message history and dialogues that happened during a mission or activity will appear! 

[i][c][ff7b00]Problem with the tutorial?[-][/c] Write an email to [c][ffb875]server@empyriongame.com[-][/c] with a BRIEF description of your issue OR contact us in the forum at [c][ffb875]empyriononline.com[-][/c]![/i]
Chinese (simplified):
在这个存档中，当你首次激活罗宾逊协议（[c][ffffff]教程[-][/c]）帮助时，你会找到那些在你首次拾取某个物品或首次打开游戏窗口时出现在屏幕上的消息！

这些消息会逐渐变得可见。

要重新阅读任何消息或对话框文本（不包括视频或图片），请按照以下步骤操作：
1. 点击'[c][fbff00]消息存档 - 教程[-][/c]'组标题后的下拉箭头。将会出现一个列表。
2. 在列表中，点击你想要再次阅读的主题或消息的[c][ffffff]标题[-][/c]。
3. 在屏幕右上角点击[c][44ff00]PDA日志[-][/c]

{ReadFirst-MessageArchives.jpg} 

在任务或活动中发生的消息历史和对话将会显示出来！

[i][c][ff7b00]教程有问题？[-][/c] 请发送邮件至[c][ffb875]mission@empyriongame.com[-][/c]，简要描述你的问题，或者在[c][ffb875]empyriononline.com[-][/c]论坛上联系我们！[/i]

English:
In this group you'll find messages that appear when you pass a certain [c][ffffff]milestone[-][/c], in case certain things become available or certain [c][ffffff]actions should be taken[-][/c]. They will literally help you see what you should do next. 

[u]Notes[/u]:
- In case you have [c][ffffff]discovered a POI[-][/c], check  '[c][fbff00]Message Archive - Exploration[-][/c]' for entries what to do next.
- In case you are following the storyline, found a log or else, please check the PDA tab '[c][ffffff]Solo Missions[-][/c]' and find the related groups or missions and their message logs & archives right there!

[c][ffffff]The messages and entries will become visible bit by bit for all of these archives and mission logs and the handling is the same as described below!.[-][/c] 

To re-read any message or dialogue text (does not include videos or pictures) that has popped up on your screen, do the following:

1. Click on the dropdown arrow behind the '[c][fbff00]What To Do Next?[-][/c]' group headline.   A list will appear.
2. In the list, click on the [c][ffffff]headline[-][/c] of the topic or message that you want to read again.
3. On the top right screen click on [c][44ff00]PDA LOG[-][/c] 

{ReadFirst-MessageArchives.jpg} 

The message history and dialogues that happened during a mission or activity will appear! 

[i][c][ff7b00]Problem with the tutorial?[-][/c] Write an email to [c][ffb875]server@empyriongame.com[-][/c] with a BRIEF description of your issue OR contact us in the forum at [c][ffb875]empyriononline.com[-][/c]![/i]
Chinese (simplified):
在这个组中，你会发现当你达到某个[c][ffffff]里程碑[-][/c]时出现的消息，或者当某些事情变得可用或者需要采取某些[c][ffffff]行动[-][/c]时。它们将直接帮助你了解下一步应该做什么。

[u]注意事项[/u]：
- 如果你[c][ffffff]发现了一个POI[-][/c]，请查看'[c][fbff00]消息存档 - 探索[-][/c]'以了解下一步的操作。
- 如果你正在跟随故事线，找到了日志或其他信息，请检查PDA标签'[c][ffffff]单人任务[-][/c]'，找到相关的组或任务以及它们的消息日志和存档！

[c][ffffff]这些存档和任务日志的消息和条目将逐渐变得可见，处理它们的方法如下所述！[-][/c] 

要重新阅读任何消息或对话框文本（不包括视频或图片），请按照以下步骤操作：
1. 点击'[c][fbff00]下一步做什么？[-][/c]'组标题后的下拉箭头。将会出现一个列表。
2. 在列表中，点击你想要再次阅读的主题或消息的[c][ffffff]标题[-][/c]。
3. 在屏幕右上角点击[c][44ff00]PDA日志[-][/c]

{ReadFirst-MessageArchives.jpg} 

在任务或活动中发生的消息历史和对话将会显示出来！

[i][c][ff7b00]教程有问题？[-][/c] 请发送邮件至[c][ffb875]mission@empyriongame.com[-][/c]，简要描述你的问题，或者在[c][ffb875]empyriononline.com[-][/c]论坛上联系我们！[/i]

The [c][ffffff](Video) Manuals[-][/c] group contains videos that become available while editing the Robinson protocol (tutorial). With these videos you can deepen your knowledge of certain topics that are only touched upon in some tutorial messages.

Use also the knowledge base available in the PDA tab '[c][ffffff]Empyriopedia[-][/c]'!

这些消息将逐个变得可见。

要重新阅读任何消息或对话框文本（不包括视频或图片），请按照以下步骤操作：
1. 点击组标题后的下拉箭头。  将出现一个列表。
2. 在列表中，点击[c][ffffff]你想要再次阅读的主题或消息的标题[-][/c]。
3. 在屏幕右上角点击[c][44ff00]PDA日志[-][/c] 

{ReadFirst-MessageArchives.jpg} 

任务或活动中发生的消息历史和对话将出现！

[i][c][ff7b00]教程有问题吗？[-][/c] 请发送电子邮件至[c][ffb875]mission@empyriongame.com[-][/c]，简要描述你的问题，或在[c][ffb875]empyriononline.com[-][/c]论坛上联系我们！[/i]

Japanese: これはアクションです

English:
To re-read any message or dialogue text (does not include videos or pictures) that has popped up on your screen, do the following:

1. Click on the dropdown arrow behind the [c][ffffff]group headline[-][/c].   A list will appear.
2. In the list, click on the [c][ffffff]headline[-][/c] of the topic or message that you want to read again.
3. On the top right screen click on [c][44ff00]PDA LOG[-][/c] 

{ReadFirst-MessageArchives.jpg} 

The message history and dialogues that happened during a mission or activity will appear! 

[i][c][ff7b00]Problem with the tutorial?[-][/c] Write an email to [c][ffb875]server@empyriongame.com[-][/c] with a BRIEF description of your issue OR contact us in the forum at [c][ffb875]empyriononline.com[-][/c]![/i]
Chinese (simplified):
要重新阅读任何出现在屏幕上的消息或对话文本（不包括视频或图片），请执行以下操作：

1. 点击 [c][ffffff]组标题[-][/c] 后面的下拉箭头。将会出现一个列表。
2. 在列表中，点击你想要再次阅读的主题或消息的 [c][ffffff]标题[-][/c]。
3. 在屏幕右上角点击 [c][44ff00]PDA 日志[-][/c] 

{ReadFirst-MessageArchives.jpg} 

将显示任务或活动期间发生的消息历史记录和对话！

[i][c][ff7b00]教程有问题？[-][/c] 请发送邮件至 [c][ffb875]mission@empyriongame.com[-][/c]，简要描述你的问题，或在 [c][ffb875]empyriononline.com[-][/c] 论坛上联系我们！[/i]

English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Unfortunately, that didn't help.  \n\nBut maybe try to open the gate next to it manually ([c][44ff00]F[-][/c]) now!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] 很遗憾，那没有帮助。\n\n但也许尝试[c][fbff00]手动[-][/c]（[c][44ff00]F[-][/c]）打开它旁边的[c][fbff00]门[-][/c]！

English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] The power is off and you can't turn it back on from up here.\n\nWe have to [c][fbff00]find and use the access outside[-][/c] to get into the lower levels!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] 电源关闭了，你无法从这里重新打开。\n\n我们需要下到[c][fbff00]下层[-][/c]！

English:
[c][00ffff]It's cold in space![-][/c]
You need at least a [c][ffffff]Light Armor[-][/c] and an [c][ffffff]EVA Booster[-][/c] to go on space walks or explore abandoned space stations! Craft both in your base- or mobile constructor (HV)! Don't forget to fill up the [c][ffffff]oxygen tanks[-][/c] of your suit and your vessel as well!

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics & Starter Info[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff]太空很冷！[-][/c]
你需要至少[c][ffffff]轻型护甲[-][/c]和一个[c][ffffff]EVA助推器[-][/c]才能进行太空行走或探索废弃的空间站！在你的基地或移动建造机（HV）中制作这两种装备！不要忘记给你的宇航服和飞船的[c][ffffff]氧气罐[-][/c]也充满氧气！

[i]指南：（[c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]）> 帝国百科 > 游戏机制与新手信息[/i]

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Asteroid Fields[-][/c][/u]
Asteroid fields are excellent sources of [c][ffffff]resources[-][/c]. However, they are also excellent hiding places for [c][ffffff]unfriendly contemporaries[-][/c].

Keep an eye on the surroundings and [c][ffffff]scan regularly with the Detector[-][/c]!
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]小行星带[-][/c][/u]
小行星带是[c][ffffff]资源[-][/c]的极佳来源。然而，它们也是[c][ffffff]不友好的同辈[-][/c]的极佳藏身之地。

保持对周围环境的警惕，并[c][ffffff]定期用探测器扫描[-][/c]！

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]DRONES (Space)[-][/c][/u]
Where there is one drone, there are sometimes several. Check your [c][ffffff]shields[-][/c] and reload your [c][ffffff]weaponry [-][/c]before engaging in combat!  

Don't forget: Always loot drone wreckages!
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]无人机（太空）[-][/c][/u]
哪里有一个无人机，有时就有好几个。在进行战斗之前检查你的[c][ffffff]护盾[-][/c]并重新装填你的[c][ffffff]武器装备[-][/c]！

不要忘记：总是搜刮无人机残骸！

English: Base material required for crafting starter devices!
Chinese (simplified): 制作启动装置所需的基本材料！

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]DRONES (Planet)[-][/c][/u]
There are different types of planetary drones, from harmless to one-hit killers. Check your [c][ffffff]health[-][/c] and reload your [c][ffffff]weapons [-][/c]before engaging in combat!  

Don't forget: Always loot drone wreckages!
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]无人机（行星）[-][/c][/u]
行星上有不同的无人机类型，从无害到一击必杀。在进行战斗之前检查你的[c][ffffff]健康[-][/c]并重新装填你的[c][ffffff]武器[-][/c]！

不要忘记：总是搜刮无人机残骸！

English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]This shipwreck seems to have served as a shelter in the past. No [c][ffffff]faction [-][/c]has claimed it, as you can see from the [c][ffffff]white nametag[-][/c] above it! This makes things easy!\n\n[c][fbff00]Find the core[-][/c], then I can guide you in taking it over if you want.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]这艘失事船似乎过去曾被用作避难所。没有[c][ffffff]派系[-][/c]宣称它，正如你从上面的[c][ffffff]白色名牌[-][/c]所看到的！这使得事情变得简单！\n\n[c][fbff00]找到核心[-][/c]，然后如果你愿意，我可以指导你接管它。

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Growing Pot (Farming)[-][/c][/u]
A Growing pot is needed to grow your own plants and food in your base. Together with [c][ffffff]seeds [-][/c]and a [c][ffffff]Plant Grow Light[-][/c] you can provide yourself with the most important things![u][c][00ffff][-][/c][/u]

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]种植区（农业）[-][/c][/u]
种植区是种植自己的植物和食物的必需品。结合[c][ffffff]芽苗[-][/c]和[c][ffffff]植物生长灯[-][/c]，你可以为自己提供最重要的东西！[u][c][00ffff][-][/c][/u]

[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English:
[c][00ffff]Craftable now: EVA Boost  ([-][/c][c][00ffff]TAB >[-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff]Survival Constructor)[-][/c]
You found [c][ffffff]gold[-][/c]! If you already have a base with a [c][ffffff]stationary constructor,[-][/c] you should use it and craft an EVA boost for your suit. You will surely need it soon during a space trip!  

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics & Starter Info[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff]现在可以制作：EVA增强器[-][/c]
你发现了[c][ffffff]金[-][/c]！如果你已经有一个基地和一个[c][ffffff]固定建造机[-][/c]，你应该使用它为你的宇航服制作一个EVA增强器。在不久的太空旅行中你肯定会需要它！

[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制 & 入门信息[/i]
采矿： 替代矿石来源

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]Alternative Ore Sources![-][/c][/u]
If you ever can't find ores like [c][ffffff]iron, copper, silicon or carbon[-][/c], you can make these materials from [c][ffffff]CRUSHED STONES[-][/c] too! Simply [c][ffffff]mine normal stones[-][/c] for crushed stones and use the corresponding recipe in your constructors!

[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics & Starter Info[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]替代矿石来源！[-][/c][/u]
如果你找不到[c][ffffff]铁、铜、硅或碳[-][/c]等矿石，你也可以从[c][ffffff]碎石[-][/c]中制作这些材料！只需[c][ffffff]开采普通石头[-][/c]获得碎石，并在你的建造机中使用相应的配方！

[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制 & 初学者信息[/i]

English: [u]Knowledge update:[/u] [c][00ffff]Thievery [-][/c]\nBefore you [c][ffffff]collect a fruit[-][/c] from a shrub or [c][ffffff]loot an unattended box[-][/c] in an inhabited facility make sure the residents are okay with it. If not, you will see a [c][fbff00]RED message in your field of view[-][/c]. Most species react unpleasantly to theft, and you will ruin a good [c][ffffff]reputation[-][/c] in no time!\n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia >  Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified): [u]知识更新:[/u] [c][00ffff]偷窃 [-][/c]\n在从一个灌木丛[c][ffffff]收集果实[-][/c]或[c][ffffff]在一个有人居住的设施中搜刮无人看管的箱子[-][/c]之前，请确保居民对此没有意见。如果不，你将在你的视野中看到一个[c][fbff00]红色消息[-][/c]。大多数物种对盗窃反应不佳，你将很快破坏一个良好的[c][ffffff]声誉[-][/c]！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]

English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  It looks like this is a snowed-in convoy.  \n\nThere's a lot of movement ... you better not go there without a [c][fbff00]proper weapon[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] 看起来这是一个被雪困住的车队。\n\n有很多动静...你最好带上[c][fbff00]合适的武器[-][/c]再去那里。

English:
[u]Knowledge update: [c][00ffff]TRADING[-][/c][/u]

1. Select an item from the list on the right ( [c][00ff11]L[-][/c]eft [c][00ff11]M[-][/c]ouse [c][00ff11]B[-][/c]utton )
2. Add the number of items you want to buy or sell in the [c][ffffff]QUANTITY [-][/c]box at the lower left.
3. Select a payment method by checking either the [c][ffffff]CASH [-][/c](money cards) or [c][ffffff]BANK ACCOUNT[-][/c] checkbox at the lower left.

Press the [c][00ff11]BUY[-][/c] or [c][00ff11]SELL button [-][/c]to initiate the transaction.

[u]Tips & Knowledge:[/u]
- You need at least one [c][ffffff]NEUTRAL[-][/c] reputation to start trading.  
- Not all traders sell or buy all items! Some are specialized, others only buy or sell certain items. Check with local stores to set up a good trade route!
- Traders usually accept cash cards (CASH) or payments from your bank account. If they only have Gold or Gold Coins, find a way to exchange them for Cash
- ATMs to access your bank account are usually found at local or orbital trading stations.
- Trading stations usually have many different merchants from different factions.
Chinese (simplified):
[u]知识更新：[c][00ffff]交易[-][/c][/u]

1. 从右侧列表中选择一个物品（[c][00ff11]L[-][/c]eft [c][00ff11]M[-][/c]ouse [c][00ff11]B[-][/c]utton）
2. 在左下角的[c][ffffff]数量[-][/c]框中输入你想购买或出售的物品数量。
3. 通过勾选左下角的[c][ffffff]现金[-][/c]（金钱卡）或[c][ffffff]银行账户[-][/c]复选框选择支付方式。

按下[c][00ff11]购买[-][/c]或[c][00ff11]出售按钮[-][/c]来启动交易。

[u]技巧与知识：[/u]
- 你需要至少[c][ffffff]中立[-][/c]的声望才能开始交易。
- 并非所有商人都出售或购买所有物品！有些是专业的，其他只购买或出售特定物品。与当地商店联系以建立良好的贸易路线！
- 商人通常接受现金卡（现金）或从你的银行账户支付。如果你只有金币或金币，找到一种方法将它们兑换成现金
- 访问你的银行账户的ATM机通常在当地或轨道交易站找到。
- 交易站通常有许多来自不同派系的不同商人。
派系声望： 恢复声望

English: [u]Knowledge update: [c][00e1ff]Restoring Reputation[-][/c][/u]\nTo restore your reputation with a faction, talk to their ambassador via a [c][ffffff]GIN console[-][/c] in a Trading Station or talk to a village leader to exchange [c][ffffff]Credibility Tokens[-][/c]. Or simply try to apologize!\n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia >  Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified): [u]知识更新：[c][00e1ff]恢复声誉[-][/c][/u]\n要恢复与某个派系的声誉，通过[c][ffffff]GIN控制台[-][/c]与贸易空间站的大使交谈，或与村长交谈以交换[c][ffffff]信誉代币[-][/c]。或者尝试道歉！\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]
派系声望 信誉令牌

English: [u]Knowledge update: [c][00e1ff]Credibility Token[-][/c][/u]\nCredibility tokens are [u]usually[/u] acquired through [c][ffffff]missions[-][/c]. If you have ruined your reputation, give it to an ambassador (GIN Console) or village leader to gradually get [c][ffffff]back to a neutral reputation level[-][/c]. \n[i]Guides: ([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > Empyriopedia >  Game Mechanics[/i]
Chinese (simplified): [u]知识更新：[c][00e1ff]信誉令牌[-][/c][/u]\n信誉令牌通常通过[c][ffffff]任务[-][/c]获得。如果你的声誉受损，将其交给大使（GIN控制台）或村长，以逐渐[c][ffffff]恢复到中立声誉水平[-][/c]。\n[i]指南：([c][44ff00]F1[-][/c]) > 帝国百科 > 游戏机制[/i]
